content: welcome cooler days in the warmth and spirit of this joyfully-striped crochet hat created in caron colorama o go first a slip_stitch ribbing is worked and then the main body of the hat is picked up along the straight side edge body is worked in single_crochet chain-1 with very simple color changes and decreases for crown shaping topped with a fun pompom it s a cheerful option for anyone on your list keep the pattern handy for this perfect gift matching scarf https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dippity-doo-scarf
